alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 3:39PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Grant County through 430 PM CST... At 337 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Boscobel to near Lancaster to Rickardsville. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Boscobel around 350 PM CST. Fennimore and Dickeyville around 355 PM CST. Platteville around 410 PM CST. Muscoda around 415 PM CST. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
